name: Extension
title: CS Extension
notes: **Note**:  Involvement of or extension to bone includes any type of tumor extension to the bone, such as erosion, invasion, extension, penetration, or destruction.
rows:
Invasive tumor confined to mucosa of one of the following:
    Frontal sinus
    Sphenoid sinus

More than one accessory sinus invaded
Destruction of bony wall of sinus

Hard palate
Nasal cavity:
    Floor
    Lateral wall
    Nasal cavity, NOS
    Septum
    Turbinates

Bone:
    Facial bones
    Maxilla
    Orbital structures
    Pterygoid fossa
    Zygoma

Brain
Cranial nerves
Muscles:
    Masseter
    Pterygoid
Nasopharynx
Orbital contents, including eye
Soft tissue
Skin

Unknown; extension not stated
Primary tumor cannot be assessed
Not documented in patient record
